duniterpy.api.bma package¶

Submodules¶

duniterpy.api.bma.api module¶

class duniterpy.api.bma.api.API(connection_handler, module)¶

Bases: object

APIRequest is a class used as an interface. The intermediate derivated classes are the modules and the leaf classes are the API requests.

connect_ws(path)¶

Connect to a websocket in order to use API parameters

Parameters:path (str) – the url path
Return type:aiohttp.ClientWebSocketResponse
requests_get(path, **kwargs)¶

Requests GET wrapper in order to use API parameters.

Parameters:path (str) – the request path
Return type:aiohttp.ClientResponse
requests_post(path, **kwargs)¶

Requests POST wrapper in order to use API parameters.

Parameters:path (str) – the request path
Return type:aiohttp.ClientResponse
reverse_url(scheme, path)¶

Reverses the url using scheme and path given in parameter.

Parameters:
  • scheme (str) – Scheme of the url
  • path (str) – Path of the url
Returns:

str
schema = {}¶
class duniterpy.api.bma.api.ConnectionHandler(http_scheme, ws_scheme, server, port, path='', proxy=None, session=None)¶

Bases: object

Helper class used by other API classes to ease passing server connection information.

duniterpy.api.bma.api.parse_error(text)¶

Validate and parse the BMA answer from websocket

Parameters:text (str) – the bma error
Returns:the json data

Validate and parse the BMA answer

Parameters:
  • response (aiohttp.ClientResponse) – Response of aiohttp request
  • schema (dict) – The expected response structure
Returns:

the json data

Return type:dict
duniterpy.api.bma.blockchain.block(connection, number=0, block=None, signature=None)¶

GET/POST a block from/to the blockchain

Parameters:
  • connection (duniterpy.api.bma.ConnectionHandler) – Connection handler instance
  • number (int) – Block number to get
  • block (dict) – Block document to post
  • signature (str) – Signature of the block document issuer
Return type:

dict

  • end (int) – End to block number
